BRIDGES

Building Resources for InterDisciplinary training in Genomic and Ecosystem Sciences (BRIDGES); an NSF Training Grant

Find Out More

A Graduate Fellowship and Training Program at the University of AZ

Ecosystem genomics promises new knowledge to sustain the biological systems that support, interact with, and are disrupted by human society, such as the agroecosystems that supply food to the world â€“ and, more generally, the plants, microbes, and insects that shape local, regional, and global cycles of energy, water, and carbon in both natural and managed ecosystems.
